Demos¶

This section describes the demos included with the Peach module. These are standalone programs that use the module to demonstrate an application or simulation using computational intelligence. They differ from the tutorials because their main focus is to get something done, while a tutorial focus is to show how to use the library.

These are the current demos:

  • The Inverted Pendulum demo
    • Starting the Program
    • The Visualization Tabs
    • Control Panel
    • Reset Panel
    • Configuration Panel
    • Show Rule
